details: We are engaged by Expedia to continuously update their image library for tourist destinations globally. This project is now in its 12th year. Our photographer will be working on his own, with hand held camera equipment, and shooting general scenic and touristic still photos and short b-roll clips. Equipment on site is very minimal, so the shoot is quick and simple. We don't do interviews, commentary, use lighting, talent of props, nor do we need exclusive use of an area.  Content is provided to Expedia for them to promote tourism in the area. Photos or b-roll videos are not sold or attached to any products for sale. Examples of use could be websites, social media posts or other marketing materials. Images are always used to promote each destination positively and accurately.
